name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dejora, Your Personal Assistant For Life

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick access to evolve and heal your state of mind with Dejora

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Provides quick access to Dejora's "Compress This" and "Heal This" techniques through the Chrome extension popup.  

In the popup you'll find the 3 simple steps and YouTube video's to guide you through Dejora's breathing techniques.
